A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The first act dragged\, and was choppy at times. The momentum of the film really kicks in after Rey trains. The final 90 minutes of this movie was the blueprint for Star Wars movies. Never a moment where you can't fist pump or laugh in that 2nd and 3rd act. Felt like 2 different movies. Wasn't disappointed AND waaaaay better than Episode 7.
